EmailTemplate.subject: Borrego Solar Customer Portal Training Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for attending the portal training today. You can log in to the portal from www.borregosolar.com - just click on 'Customer Login' in the top right corner. I would recommend using Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome browsers, as Internet Explorer can encounter problems. If you do use Internet Explorer, make sure it's the latest version.
Username: dcl@borregosolar.com Password: solar123
Some quick tips: - Within the Performance Reporting link we've added simple reporting capabilities so you can print out historical production information. Just choose the view you'd like to see across the top (e.g. 'Month'), choose a start date on the calendar at the bottom (e.g. '5/1/2014') and click the arrow to the right to download an Excel document. - Use Contact Us to submit questions or notify us of a problem with the system. Just fill out the appropriate fields and click 'Submit Inquiry' at the bottom - it will alert multiple parties within Borrego and ensures the quickest response time. - We've expanded details regarding Cases and Service Visits, so you'll be able to see real-time updates if your system undergoes repair and will know when to expect us on site for any scheduled Service Visits. - Lastly, I created an automatic recurring production report that now posts within your documents folder on the portal. Just click the link within the Project Documents tab and click on the '00. Production Reports' folder to access the previous month's report. These reports will populate on the 1st of the month and will include production data for the preceding month.
Thanks again for your time and for {!Account.Name}'s commitment to solar energy. I look forward to working with you and am here should you need anything moving forward.
Cheers, Tommy
Tommy Sunderland Customer Experience Manager
Borrego Solar Systems, Inc. 360 22nd Street, Suite 600 Oakland, CA 94612 P. 510-496-8710 F. 888-843-6778
